properties.title: Gurten - Bern's home mountain
properties.abstract: Gurten - an ascent to the heart of nature; and a place close to the city that could well be described as seventh heaven. At an altitude of 858 meters, Gurten offers fresh air, extensive views over the Alps and fun for the whole family.
properties.description:
Bern’s home mountain not only serves as a delightful spot to recuperate; but in addition as summit and meeting point for gourmets, music fans and sport and theatre enthusiasts.

Gurten offers a broad range of entertainment and culture; with leisure and pleasure at the forefront. It's an ideal place for recreational activities; with children's paradise playground, miniature railway, places for grilling and observation tower.  By fine weather, breathtaking views over the Alps are enjoyed - and summer sees many attractive events held in Gurten; including the popular annual Gurten Festival that draws crowds every year. Moreover, the Parc im Grünen establishment provides a pleasant ambiance for seminars and meetings – along with a restaurant fit for gourmet palates.
